name: @autonomys/integration-tests
description: Integration tests for Autonomys SDK packages

scripts.docker:up: cd docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.farmerless.yml up -d
scripts.docker:up:full: cd docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.docker:down: cd docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.farmerless.yml down -v
scripts.docker:down:full: cd docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml down -v
scripts.docker:logs: cd docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.farmerless.yml logs -f
scripts.docker:logs:full: cd docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml logs -f
